snippet: Megan Huntsman said she killed six of her babies immediately after giving birth, interring them in the garage of her family’s home.
abstract: Utah district judge sets $6 million bail for Megan Huntsman as investigators seek to unravel questions about how she could have concealed the fact that she had killed six of her babies and interred them, as well as a stillborn child, in the garage of her family's brick home in Pleasant Grove.

byline.original: By JENNIFER DOBNER and JACK HEALY
byline.contributor: Jennifer Dobner reported from Pleasant Grove, Utah, and Jack Healy from Denver.

lead_paragraph: Megan Huntsman said she killed six of her babies immediately after giving birth, interring them in the garage of her family’s home.

headline.main: Utah Garage Cleaning Turns Up Boxes of Suffocated Infants
headline.print_headline: Utah Garage Cleaning Turns Up Boxes of Suffocated Infants
